author: Jacob Kagi
title: Road toll and crime rates plunge as people stay home, but one type of crime defies the trend
description: WA Police say there has been a "definite and distinct" drop in crime amid the COVID-19 emergency, with statistics down as much as 40 per cent in some parts of the state.
content:
Posted 
April 08, 2020 12:52:39
WA Police say there has been a "definite and distinct" drop in crime amid the COVID-19 emergency, with statistics down as much as 40 per cent in some parts of the state.
